title: Dream5.Start
body:
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController OpeningShot>>
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController Scene1>>
Guard: What...
Guard: What are you doing in here?
Guard: You're one of the channelers!
Guard: How did you get in here?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController EmmaCloseup>>
Emma: ...
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController Scene2>>
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController EmmaLookingDown>>
Guard: I don't recognize you
Guard: but I'll find out
Guard: ...
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController OpeningShot>>
Guard: Are you here to guilt me?
Guard: Working as a guard in a slave colony
Guard: Do you think I wanted this?
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController Scene3>>
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController EmmaCloseToGuard>>
Guard: I feel guilty, sure
Guard: There's no way the republic would survive without slave labor
Guard: Everyone knows that
Guard: ...
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController GuardCloseup>>
Guard: What do you want from me!?
Guard: Answer Me!
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController EmmaCloseToGuard>>
Guard: Answer Me!!
<<returnToCampScene SceneShotController>>
